title: Eric Weinstein's G-Grandma's Sorrow with Squatters on the Lord's Estate
description:
On Veteran's Day Eric Weinstein tweeted a small story about his Great-Grandmother who lost her faith over the death of her brother. Why doesn't God offer us settled happiness here? Could he? What denials do we live within in our anger and avoidance? 

The tweet https://twitter.com/EricRWeinstein/status/1061763267310215168 
Joy Davidman bio https://www.amazon.com/Joy-Seeker-Woman-Captivated-Lewis-ebook/dp/B00LZ7GNZS

The Problem of Pain https://www.amazon.com/Problem-Pain-C-S-Lewis-ebook/dp/B002BD2USY 

God, Freedom and Evil https://www.amazon.com/God-Freedom-Evil-Alvin-Plantinga-ebook/dp/B0036FUCHC

Tim Keller https://www.amazon.com/Walking-God-through-Pain-Suffering-ebook/dp/B00C1N951O

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

You can donate to Living Stones CRC to support this work here http://www.livingstonescrc.org/donate 
Donations may be tax deductible for taxpayers of the United States
